#summary CrossWire Bible Society to adopt Go Bible as its Java ME application.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

In Summer 2008, an agreement was made between the director of the *CrossWire Bible Society* and the author of Go Bible for CrossWire to adopt it as its Java ME application.
